channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Texas floods leave at least 51 dead, 27 girls missing as rescuers search devastated landscape
item.description: The destructive fast-moving waters along the Guadalupe River rose 26 feet in just 45 minutes before dawn Friday, washing away homes and vehicles.

item.title: Elon Musk launches ‘America Party’ after Trump signs historic spending bill: 'Waste & graft'
item.description: Elon Musk launched the "America Party" Saturday, calling for an end to the “uniparty" system after President Donald Trump signed the "big, beautiful b...

item.title: Deadly Texas flood exposes 'neglected' weather alert system Trump aims to modernize
item.description: DHS Secretary Kristi Noem addressed the deadly Texas flood, promising to upgrade "ancient" National Weather Service systems for better early warnings.

item.title: Viewpoint Diversity in Higher Education Should Mean More Conservatives
item.description: A few enclaves in a few institutions, while laudable, are not sufficient to combat intellectual homogeneity across the universities.

item.title: Trump DOJ Drops Cases Against Top MS-13 Leaders
item.description: The deal with Bukele comes with significant strings attached, it turns out.

item.title: Secret Service in US expands a global push against crypto scams
item.description: The Secret Service's Global Investigative Operations Center has seized nearly $400 million in digital assets over the last decade.

item.title: U.S. competes deportation of 8 felon migrants to South Sudan
item.description: Homeland Security said Saturday that it has finally deported eight illegal immigrants -- all of them with serious criminal records -- to South Sudan, ...

item.title: NATO leader Mark Rutte compliments Trump's leadership
item.description: NATO Secretary-General Mark Rutte applauded President Trump for the work he did at the NATO summit to get other members to spend more on defense.

item.title: Elon Musk lays out America Party's look
item.description: Elon Musk floated more ideas for his proposed America Party as he continues his breakup with President Trump.

item.title: DHS: Several criminal illegal aliens deported to South Sudan after delays from 'activist judges'
item.description: The Department of Homeland Security said it deported several violent criminal illegal aliens after weeks of delays caused by court orders from "activi...

item.title: The Declaration of Independence Resolves America’s Identity Crisis
item.description: The Declaration is not only a reasoned account for a free people, it is also a source for their honor and glory in death and war.

item.title: Trump defends use of ‘shylock’ term at rally amid antisemitism claims
item.description: President Donald Trump has defended his use of the term "shylock" at a rally this week, saying he is unaware it is considered antisemitic by some peop...

item.title: Trump says TikTok deal will be discussed with China soon
item.description: President Trump said a potential TikTok deal will start being discussed early next week with China.

item.title: In Sinaloa's capital, news of a boxing scion's arrest and allegations of cartel ties cause unease
item.description: Inside a sports arena in Sinaloa state's capital, the crowd was sparse early on the card as young amateur boxers in puffy headgear threw punches and d...

item.title: Texas summer camp hit by flood has been in the same clan for generations and has served the state’s top families
item.description: Relatives of prominent Texas politicians, including President Lyndon Johnson, have attended the camp over the years.

item.title: Kicking Off America’s 250th at Mount Vernon
item.description: I cannot tell a lie. George, Martha, and their stately home are star attractions.

item.title: We Must Protect America as the Last, Best Hope for Freedom
item.description: Religious freedom and freedom of speech make up the engine of self-government and form a bulwark against tyranny. And they need our protection.

item.title: Musk forms America Party ‘to give you back your freedom’ after reigniting bitter feud with Trump
item.description: "When it comes to bankrupting our country with waste & graft, we live in a one-party system, not a democracy," Musk said on X.

item.title: Democrats project doom and gloom, not celebration, with July 4 messages
item.description: Several prominent Democrats, including former Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Barack Obama, drew the public's ire with pessimistic s...

item.title: The world could get carved up into these 3 blocs as Trump tariffs fuel deglobalization. Here’s which side each country might join
item.description: Wells Fargo sketched out a hypothetical scenario where the world is divided into three trading blocs led by the U.S., China, and the EU.

item.title: This Independence Day, Ditch The DNA Test And Learn More About Your American Ancestors
item.description: In a frustratingly divided nation, we need stories that unite us to a shared American vision of the good life based on our nation’s founding principle...

item.title: Route 66 Diner Owners Share What They Love About The All-American Nostalgic Road Trip
item.description: People don’t visit Route 66 to change America; they come to be changed by it.

item.title: Men Listen To Podcasters Like Andrew Schulz Because Women Have Invaded Their Real-Life Spaces
item.description: The secret formula the podcasters have figured out is that audiences want to be talked to, not talked at.

item.title: Independence Day Sounds So Much Better Than ‘Fourth Of July’
item.description: Honor our country's birthday as 'Independence Day,' rather than the far more common and clunky 'Fourth of July.'

item.title: Trump Wins Again. Big Beautiful Bill Headed To The President’s Desk
item.description: The signature domestic policy victory is another in a long line of brutal political butt-kickings Teflon Trump has delivered to the Democrats.

item.title: Buyers Beware: 7 Red Flags That Signal a Private Market Reckoning
item.description: Explore red flags in private markets as speculative excess, retail marketing, and valuation risks mount. Lessons from financial history.

item.title: From Models to Markets: A Conversation with Kenneth Blay
item.description: Invesco's Kenneth Blay shares insights on portfolio customization, macro strategy, and the role of judgment in modern investing.
